channel.title: Pages on Syniti Documentation
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on Syniti Documentation

item.title: All Actionable Reports H
item.description: All Actionable Reports H All Actionable Reports V Use this page to View Actionable Reports and Historical Record Count. To access this page in Transform: Select My Reports > All Reports in the Navigation pane. Click the Actionable Reports icon for the desired Object. NOTE: After a user clicks the Access Report icon and then clicks the View Report icon, the records for the selected report display in the child pane.

item.title: All Business Reports
item.description: All Business Reports Use this page to View All Reports. To access this page in Transform: Select **My Reports > All Reports **in the Navigation pane. Click the All Reports icon for the desired Object.

item.title: All Business Reports – All Wave/Process Areas H
item.description: All Business Reports – All Wave/Process Areas H All Business Reports – All Wave/Process Areas V Use this page to View All Reports Across Waves and Process Areas. To access this page in Transform, select My Reports > All Business Reports (All Wave/Process Areas) in the Navigation pane. NOTE: After a user clicks the Access Report icon, then clicks the View Report icon, the records for the selected report display. This page is also called All Business Reports – All Wave/Process Areas but the fields on this page update based on the errors on the target reports.

item.title: All Reports (By Object)
item.description: All Reports (By Object) Use this page to View All Reports for an Object. To access this page in Transform, select My Reports > All Reports in the Navigation pane. Field Description OBJECT Displays the Object registered under the current Wave Process Area context. All Reports Click to open the All Business Reports page to display all reports the current user is assigned to under a given object.

item.title: All Reports (By Source)
item.description: All Reports (By Source) Use this page to View all Reports for a Source. To access this page in Transform: Click My Reports > All Reports in the Navigation pane. Click the Targets icon for an object. Click the Sources icon for a target. Field Description OBJECT Displays the object containing the source. TARGET Displays the target containing the source.

item.title: All Reports (By Target)
item.description: All Reports (By Target) Use this page to View All Reports for a Target. To access this page in Transform: Click My Reports > All Reports in the Navigation pane. Click the Targets icon for an object. Field Description OBJECT Displays the Object registered under the current Wave Process Area context. TARGET Displays the target that contains the reports.

item.title: All Reports All Users
item.description: All Reports All Users Use this page to: Assign a User to a Report on Report Delivery Pages Grant a User Access to Sensitive Data on Report Delivery Pages To access this page in Transform: Click the Targets icon on the Process Area Launch page. Click the Reports icon for a Target. Click the Vertical View icon for the report. Click the Business User Settings tab. Click the Sensitive check box to check it.

item.title: All Reports H
item.description: All Reports H All Reports V This report lists all reports for all Targets and Target Sources for all report types for all contexts. The record count, the date the report last ran, and icons to view and download the report are also included. To access this page in Transform, select Reports > All Reports in the Navigation pane. All Reports V All Reports H Field Description Target ID Displays the name of the target on which the report is based.

item.title: Assign Filters By User
item.description: Assign Filters By User Use this page to .Assign a User to a Report Delivery Filter. To access this page: Access Transform. Select Configuration > User Filter > User Filter (By User) in the Navigation pane. Select a user on the User Filters By User Parent page.

item.title: Complexity (Setup)
item.description: Complexity (Setup) Use this page to Configure Complexity Values. To access this page, select Configuration > Setup > Complexity (Setup) in the Navigation pane. Field Description COMPLEXITY Displays the DSP-supplied Complexity Values (Simple, Average, Complex). FACTOR Displays the conversion factor. MIGRATION HOURS ESTIMATE Displays the number of hours tasks of this complexity value should take to complete.

item.title: Copy Filter
item.description: Copy Filter Use this page to Copy a Report Delivery Filter. To access this page: Access Transform. Select Configuration > User Filter > User filter (By Filter) in the Navigation pane. Select a filter. Click the Copy Filter icon in the Page toolbar.

item.title: Cutover Plan
item.description: Cutover Plan This report provides a checklist of all the Source and Target tables in the migration project as well as the data source that stores the Target Source tables. To access this page: Access Transform. Click Reports in the Navigation plane. Click the Cutover Plan link in the REPORT column. Field Description TARGET PRIORITY Displays the order the target is processed.

item.title: Debug - Breakpoints
item.description: Debug - Breakpoints Use this page to Debug Rules and Reports Using Breakpoints. To access this page: Access Transform. Click the Targets icon on the Process Area Launch page. Select a Target. Click the Debug icon on the Page toolbar. Field Description Process Click to process the job until the next breakpoint. Clear Breakpoints Click to remove all breakpoints.

item.title: Debug - Breakpoints (Target Sources)
item.description: Debug - Breakpoints (Target Sources) Use this page to Debug Rules and Reports Using Breakpoints. To access this page: Access Transform. Click the Targets icon on the Process Area Launch page. Click the Sources icon for a Target. Click the Debug icon on the Page toolbar on the Target Sources page, the Target Source Reports page, or the Target Source Rules page. Field Description Process Click to process the job until the next breakpoint.

item.title: Filter Column and Values
item.description: Filter Column and Values Use this page to .Create Report Delivery Filters. To access this page: Access Transform. Select Configuration > User Filter > User Filter (By Filter) in the Navigation pane.

item.title: Filters
item.description: Filters Use this page to: Create Report Delivery Filters Add a User to a Report Delivery Filter To access this page: Access Transform. Select Configuration > User Filter > User Filter (By Filter) in the Navigation pane. Field Description Copy Filter Click to copy an existing filter. NAME Displays the name of the filter.

item.title: Import / Export Types (Setup)
item.description: Import / Export Types (Setup) Use this page to Configure Import/Export Types. To access this page: Access Transform. Select Configuration > Setup > Import / Export Types (Setup) in the Navigation pane. Field Description TYPE Displays the resource that can be imported or exported in Transform. The DSP-supplied values are Database, Collect, Flat File, and Manual. DESCRIPTION Displays a description of the import / export type.

item.title: Load Types (Setup)
item.description: Load Types (Setup) This page displays the load types used for Transform exports. It is for informational purposes only. To access this page: Access Transform. Select Configuration > Setup > Load Types (Setup) in the Navigation pane. Field Description LOAD TYPE Displays the method or tool Transform uses to load data into the target system. ACTIVE If checked, the load type is available for use with Transform exports.

item.title: Milestone Objects H
item.description: Milestone Objects H Milestone Objects V Use this page to Create Milestones. To access this page: Access Transform. Select Tracking > Milestones in the Navigation pane. Click the Objects icon for a Milestone. Field Description OBJECT Displays the name of the object as created in Console and captured for the milestone selected on the Milestonespage. TARGET Displays the target table name.

item.title: Milestones
item.description: Milestones Use this page to Create Milestones. To access this page: Access Transform. Select Tracking > Milestones in the *Navigation *pane. Field Description DESCRIPTION Displays a name entered for the milestone. COMMENT Displays user-entered comments about the milestone. CAPTURED ON Displays the date the milestone was captured. CAPTURE Click to record the milestone, which includes a snapshot of record counts for targets, sources, rules and reports.

item.title: Monitor H
item.description: Monitor H Monitor V Use this page to Monitor Jobs. To access this page: Access Transform. Click Monitor in the Navigation pane. Field Description Tasks Click to open the Tasks page where tasks associated with the job display. The count indicates the total number of tasks for the process. Continue Click to restart a failed job (after correcting the error) at the fixed rule.

item.title: Object (Metrics)
item.description: Object (Metrics) This report provides a view of the objects developed each week. This feature can be used to monitor the activity within each object and, more specifically, each Target. To access this page: Access Transform. Select Tracking > Object (Metrics) in the Navigation pane. Field Description PERIOD TYPE Displays the year and week the object was added.

item.title: Object Documentation
item.description: Object Documentation Use this page to Generate Documentation for Objects. To access this page: Access Transform. Click the Objects icon on the Process Area Launch page. Click the Vertical View icon or an Object. Click the Generated Documentation icon. Field Description REPORT Click to view the Object Documentation Reports page to view a list of all audit reports that have been generated for the object.

item.title: Object Documentation Reports
item.description: Object Documentation Reports Use this page to View and Download Generated Documentation for Objects. To access this page: Access Transform. Click the Objects icon on the Process Area Launch page. Click the Vertical Viewicon for an Object. Click the Generated Documentation icon. Click the Generate Audit Documentation icon.

item.title: Object Estimates (Setup)
item.description: Object Estimates (Setup) Use this page to Configure Object Estimates. To access this page: Access Transform. Select Configuration > Setup > Object Estimates (Setup) in the Navigation pane. Field Description OBJECT TYPE Displays the object type (as in the report or rule) that can have estimates calculated. COUNT ESTIMATE Displays the factor used in calculating the estimates in metric reports.

item.title: Objects
item.description: Objects NOTE: There is another page is Transform called Objects used to work with objects. Use this page to access the Target All Errors Report. To access this page in Transform: Select My Reports > All Reports in the Navigation pane. Click the Errors By Target icon. Field Description WAVE Displays the wave that contains the target for which reports are generated.

item.title: Objects H
item.description: Objects H Objects V Use this page to Work with Objects. To access this page in Transform, select the Objects icon on the Process Area Launch page. Objects V Objects H Use this page to Work with Objects. Field Description Reset Click to reset the processing status if a process fails for any of the object’s targets, target reports, target rules, and target exports. Process Click to run the entire target in the background by importing all data from all sources and running all source rules and source reports, target rules, target reports and target exports (in that order).

item.title: Process Area Launch
item.description: Process Area Launch Use this page to Access Transform. To access this page, Access Transform. Field Description Wave Displays the Wave added in Console and selected (along with the Process Area) in the Context Bar. Process Area Displays the Process Area added in Console and selected (along with the Wave) in the Context Bar. Objects Click to open the Objects page to edit the object’s priority, view the targets associated with an object, and process all children of the object (targets, target sources, and their associated rules and reports, along with target exports).

item.title: Report Access (By Report, By User)
item.description: Report Access (By Report, By User) Use this page to View the Report User Access Dashboard. To access this page: Access Transform. Select Tracking > Report User Access Dashboard in the Navigation pane.

item.title: Report Quick List H
item.description: Report Quick List H Report Quick List V Use this page to Add a Report to the Report Quick List. To access this page, select My Reports >Report Quick List in the Navigation pane. NOTE: After a user clicks the Access Report icon, then clicks the View Report icon, the records for the selected report display. This page is also called Report Quick List, but the fields on this page update based on the errors on the target reports.

item.title: Report Readiness Notification
item.description: Report Readiness Notification Use this page to: Assign a User as a Notification Recipient Configure Subject and Body of the Notification Send Notification Manually To access this page in Transform: Click the Objects icon on the Process Area Launch page. Click the Report Readiness Notification icon. Field Description Add Recipient Click to add any highlighted user as a message recipient.

item.title: Report Run Historical Record Count
item.description: Report Run Historical Record Count Use this page to view the number of records on the report selected on the All Business Reports page for each run of the report over time. To access the chart: Select Transform > My Reports > All Reports in the Navigation pane. Click the All Reports icon for an object. Click the History icon for a report.

item.title: Report Types (Setup)
item.description: Report Types (Setup) Use this page to Add Report Types. To access this page: Access Transform. Select Configuration > Setup > Report Types (Setup) in the Navigation pane.

item.title: Report User Access Log
item.description: Report User Access Log Use this page to View the Report User Access Log. To access this page: Access Transform. Select Tracking > Report User Access Log in the Navigation pane. Field Description Wave Displays the name of the Wave the target is assigned to. Process Area Displays the name of the Process Area the selected report is assigned to.

item.title: Reports
item.description: Reports To access this page: Access Transform. Click Reports in the Navigation plane. Field Description PRIORITY Displays the report’s priority, which is the order the report displays on the Reportspage. REPORT Click the report name to open the report.

item.title: Reports – Never Viewed
item.description: Reports – Never Viewed Use this page to View the Reports – Never Viewed. To access this page: Access Transform. Select Tracking > Reports - Never Viewedin the Navigationpane. Field Description Wave Displays the name of the Wave the target is assigned to. Process Area Displays the name of the Process Area the selected report is assigned to.

item.title: Reports – Updated Not Viewed (By User)
item.description: Reports – Updated Not Viewed (By User) Use this page to View the Reports – Updated Not Viewed (By User). To access this page: Access Transform. Select Tracking > Reports - Updated Not Viewed (By User) in the Navigation pane. Field Description WAVE Displays the name of the Wave the target is assigned to. PROCESS AREA Displays the name of the Process Area the selected report is assigned to.

item.title: Sample Sizes (Setup)
item.description: Sample Sizes (Setup) Use this page to Configure Sample Size. To access this page: Access Transform. Select Configuration > Setup > Sampling Methods(Setup) in the Navigation pane. Click the Sample Size icon next to the sampling method you want to use. For example, ANSI/ASQC Z1.4 GI I or Square Root. NOTE: This is the method used in Transform if it meets auditing requirements. NOTE: Using the number of records in your table, locate the range that it falls between.

item.title: Sampling Methods (Setup)
item.description: Sampling Methods (Setup) Use this page to Configure Sampling Methods. To access this page: Access Transform. Select Configuration > Setup > Sampling Methods (Setup) in the Navigation pane. Field Description DESCRIPTION Displays the name of the sampling method to use when selecting random rows of data for verification during the audit process. ACTIVE If checked, the sampling method is available in the Sample Method list box on the Process Information tab on the Target Report page’s Vertical View and can be used to select a sample of data from a target report to verify.

item.title: Score Card (Metrics)
item.description: Score Card (Metrics) This report displays the status of the Data Migration Management Team and is typically provided to the PMO. The report has very high level traffic light indicators (green, yellow and red) to reflect the status of each object. To access this page: Access Transform. Select Tracking > Score Card (Metrics) in the Navigation pane. Field Description OBJECT ID Displays the name of the Wave, Process Area, and object as created in Console.

item.title: Score Card Limits (Setup)
item.description: Score Card Limits (Setup) Use this page to Configure Score Card Limits. To access this page: Access Transform. Select Configuration > Setup > Score Card Limits (Setup) in the Navigation pane. Field Description SEVERITY Displays the severity of a metric status. IMAGE Displays the image associated with the score card limit severity. ERROR REPORT Displays the number of error reports generated to define this severity.

item.title: Source (Errors) H
item.description: Source (Errors) H Source (Errors) V This report lists all Target Source reports for all contexts that are error reports. Report types of Error and Target Readiness display on this report. The record count, the date the report last ran, and icons to view and download the report are also included. NOTE: When a user accesses the Source (Errors) report in the Navigationpane, the fields below display. When a user clicks View on the Source (Errors) page to view report data, the report title still reads Source (Errors) even though the columns that display depend on the columns on the generated report.

item.title: Source (Info) H
item.description: Source (Info) H Source (Info) V This report lists all Target Source reports for all contexts that are info reports. All report types that are not error report types (Error and Target Readiness) display on this report page. The record count, the date the report last ran, and icons to view and download the report are also included NOTE: When a user accesses the Source (Info) report in the Navigation pane, the fields below display.

item.title: Status (Setup)
item.description: Status (Setup) Use this page to View Status. To access this page: Access Transform. Select Configuration > Setup > Status (Setup) in the Navigation pane. Field Description STATUS Displays a unique identifier associated with the status. DESCRIPTION Displays the status name. EXECUTE If checked, an object in that status will be processed. If unchecked, an object in that status will not be processed.

item.title: Target (Errors) H
item.description: Target (Errors) H Target (Errors) V This report lists all Target reports for all contexts that are error reports. Report types of Error and Target Readiness display on this report page. The record count, the last date the report ran, and icons to view and download the report are also included. NOTE: When a user accesses the Target (Errors) report in the Navigation pane, the fields below display. When a user clicks View on the Target (Errors) page to view report data, the report title still reads Target (Errors) even though the columns that display depend on the columns on the generated report.

item.title: Target (Info) H
item.description: Target (Info) H Target (Info) V This report lists all Target reports for all contexts that are info reports. All report types that are not error report types (Error and Target Readiness) display on this report page. The record count, the last date the report ran, and icons to view and download the report are also included. NOTE: When a user accesses the Target (Info) report in the Navigationpane, the fields below display.

item.title: Target All Errors Report
item.description: Target All Errors Report Use this page to View all Reports for a Target. To access this page in Transform: Select My Reports > All Reports in the Navigation pane. Click the Errors By Target icon. NOTE; After a user clicks the Generate Report icon then the View Target All Errors Report, the report records display on a page that is also named Target All Errors report. The fields on this page update based on the errors on the target reports.

item.title: Target Data Services Remediation H
item.description: Target Data Services Remediation H Target Data Services Remediation V All Tabs Use this page to Register Target Data Services Remediation Rules. To access this page: Access Transform. Click the Targets icon on the Process Area Launch page. Click the Data Services Reports icon for a Target. Click the Vertical View icon for a report. Click the Remediation Information tab. Click the Remediation icon. Target Data Services Remediation V All Tabs Target Data Services Remediation H

item.title: Target Data Services Remediation Overview
item.description: Target Data Services Remediation Overview Use this page to View Data Services Remediation Rule Information. To access this page: Access Transform. Click the Targets icon on the Process Area Launch page. Click the Data Services Remediation icon for the selected target. Field Description TARGET ID Displays the name of the target table. E Click to open the Target Data Services Remediation Setup page to edit remediation and fixed remediation settings.

item.title: Target Data Services Remediation Setup
item.description: Target Data Services Remediation Setup Use this page to View Data Services Remediation Rule Information. To access this page: Access Transform. Click the Targets icon on the Process Area Launch page. Click the Data Services Remediation icon for the selected Target. Click Edit. Field Description Target ID Displays the name of the target table. Target Report Displays the name of the report that the rule will be applied to.

item.title: Target Data Services Report Segments
item.description: Target Data Services Report Segments Use this page to Assign a User to a Report Segment. To access this page: Access Transform. Click the Targets icon on the Process Area Launch page. Click the Data Services Reports icon for a Target. Click the Vertical View icon for a specified report. Click the Segments icon. Field Description SEGMENT BY FIELD Displays the report field whose distinct values will determine the number of segments and in turn the segment value for each segment.

item.title: Target Data Services Reports H
item.description: Target Data Services Reports H Target Data Services Reports V Use this page to Grant a User Access to Sensitive Data on Report Delivery Pages. NOTE:Bulk Execution has been enabled on this page. Refer to Use Bulk Execution for more information. To access this page in Transform: Click the Targetsicon on the Process Area Launch page. Click the Data Services Reportsicon for a Target. Target Data Services Reports V Target Data Services Reports H

item.title: Target Data Services Rule Audit H
item.description: Target Data Services Rule Audit H NOTE:This page is not used in this product release. Target Data Services Rule Audit V (All Tabs) To access this page: Access Transform. Select Reports > Target Data Services Rule (Audit) in the Navigation pane. Target Data Services Rule Audit V Target Data Services Rule Audit H NOTE:This page is not used in this product release. This page has the following tabs:

item.title: Target Data Services Rule Global Variables
item.description: Target Data Services Rule Global Variables Use this page to configure target Data Services rule global variables.To access this page: Access Transform. Click the Targets icon on the Process Area Launch page. Click the Data Services Rules icon for a Target. Click the Vertical View icon for the Data Services rule. Click the Global Variables icon; the Target Data Services Rule Global Variables page displays. Field Description NAME Displays the variable name.

item.title: Target Data Services Rules H
item.description: Target Data Services Rules H Target Data Services Rules V Use this page to Add Target Data Services Rules. NOTE:Bulk Execution has been enabled on this page. Refer to Use Bulk Execution for more information. To access this page: Access Transform. Click the Targets icon on the Process Area Launch page. Click the Data Services Rules icon for a Target. Target Data Services Rules V Target Data Services Rules H

item.title: Target Documentation
item.description: Target Documentation Use this page to Generate Documentation for Targets. To access this page: Access Transform. Click the Targets icon on the Process Area Launch page. Click the Vertical View icon for a Target. Click the Generated Documentationicon. Field Description OBJECT ID Displays the name of the object as created in Console. TARGET ID Displays the name of the target table.

item.title: Target Documentation Reports
item.description: Target Documentation Reports Use this page to View and Download Generated Documentation for Targets. To access this page: Access Transform. Click the Targets icon on the Process Area Launch page. Click the Vertical View icon for a Target. Click the Generated Documentation icon. Field Description REPORT Displays the type of report: Recon, Audit or Technical. GENERATED ON Displays the date and time the report was generated on the Target Documentation page.

item.title: Target Exports H
item.description: Target Exports H Target Exports V All Tabs Use this page to Add Target Exports. To access this page: Access Transform. Click the Targets icon on the Process Area Launch page. Click the Exports icon for a Target. Target Exports V All Tabs Target Exports H Use this page to Add Target Exports. This page has the following tabs: General tab Process Information tab General tab Field

item.title: Target Remediation H
item.description: Target Remediation H Target Remediation V All Tabs Use this page to Register Target Remediation Rules. To access this page: Access Transform. Click the Targetsicon on the Process Area Launch page. Click the Reports icon for a Target. Click the Vertical View icon for a report. Click the Remediation Information tab. Click the Remediation icon. Target Remediation V All Tabs Target Remediation H Use this page to Register Target Remediation Rules.

item.title: Target Remediation Overview
item.description: Target Remediation Overview Use this page to View Remediation Rule Information. To access this page: Access Transform. Click the Targets icon on the Process Area Launch page. Click the TR icon for the selected Target. OR Click the Reports icon for the Target, and click the TR icon for the report. Field Description TARGET ID Displays the name of the target table.

item.title: Target Remediation Setup
item.description: Target Remediation Setup Use this page to View Remediation Rule Information. To access this page: Access Transform. Click the Targets icon on the Process Area Launch page. Click the TR icon for the selected target. Click the pencil icon under the E column for a target on the Target Remediation Overview page. Field Description Target ID Displays the name of the target table. Target Report Displays the name of the report that the rule will be applied to.

item.title: Target Report Segment User Assignment
item.description: Target Report Segment User Assignment Use this page to Assign a User to a Target Report Segment. To access this page: Access Transform. Click the Targets icon on the Process Area Launch page. Click the Reports icon for a Target. Click the Vertical View icon for a specified report. Click the Business User Settings tab. Click the Business User Segment Assignment icon.

item.title: Target Report Segments
item.description: Target Report Segments Use this page to Assign a User to a Report Segment. To access this page: Access Transform. Click the Targets icon on the Process Area Launch page. Click the Reports icon for a Target. Click the Vertical View icon for a specified report. Click the Business User Settings tab. Click the Business User Segment Assignment icon.

item.title: Target Reports H
item.description: Target Reports H Target Reports V All Tabs Use this page to Add Target Reports. NOTE:Bulk Execution has been enabled on this page. Refer to Use Bulk Execution for more information. To access this page in Transform: Click the Targets icon on the Process Area Launch page. Click the Reports icon for a Target. Target Reports V All Tabs Target Reports H Use this page to: Add Target Reports Create Target Report Segments This page has the following tabs:

item.title: Target Reports Segments
item.description: Target Reports Segments Use this page to view target report segments while Creating Target Report Segments. To access this page: Access Transform. Click the Targets icon on the Process Area Launch page. Click the Reports icon for a Target. Click the Vertical View icon for a specified report. Click the Segments icon. Field Description SEGMENT BY FIELD Displays the report field whose distinct values will determine the number of segments and in turn the segment value for each segment.

item.title: Target Rule (Audit)
item.description: Target Rule (Audit) This report lists all Target audit reports for all contexts. The record count, the date the report last ran, and icons to view and download the report are also included. To access this page: Access Transform. Select **Reports > Target Rule (Audit)**in the Navigationpane.

item.title: Target Rule Audit H
item.description: Target Rule Audit H Target Rule Audit V (All Tabs) Use this page when Adding Target Audit Rules. To access this page: Access Transform. Click the Targets icon on the Process Area Launch page. Click the Rules icon for a Target. Click the Vertical View icon for a rule. Click the Documentation tab. Click the Audit icon. Target Rule Audit V Target Rule Audit H Use this page when Adding Target Audit Rules.

item.title: Target Rules H
item.description: Target Rules H Target Rules V All Tabs Use this page to Add Target Rules. NOTE:Bulk Execution has been enabled on this page. Refer to Use Bulk Execution for more information. To access this page: Access Transform. Click the Targets icon on the Process Area Launch page. Click the Rules icon for a Target. Target Rules V All Tabs Target Rules H Use this page to Add Target Rules.

item.title: Target Source Documentation
item.description: Target Source Documentation Use this page to Generate Documentation for Target Sources. To access this page in Transform: Click the Targets icon on the Process Area Launch page. Click the Sources icon for a Target. Click the Vertical View icon for a source. Click the Generated Documentation icon. Field Description REPORT Click to view the Target Source Documentation Reports page to view a list of all audit reports that have been generated for the Target Source.

item.title: Target Source Documentation Reports
item.description: Target Source Documentation Reports Use this page to View and Download Generate Documentation for Target Sources. To access this page in Transform: Click the Targets icon on the Process Area Launch page. Click the Sources icon for a Target. Click the Vertical View icon for a source. Click the Generated Documentation icon. Click the Generate Audit Documentation icon. Field Description REPORT Displays the type of report, which is Audit.

item.title: Target Source Reports H
item.description: Target Source Reports H Target Source Reports V All Tabs Use this page to: Add Target Source Reports Publish Reports to Report Delivery Pages NOTE:Bulk Execution has been enabled on this page. See the Bulk Execution topic in System Administration for more information. To access this page in Transform: Select the Targets icon on the Process Area Launch page. Click the Sources icon for a Target. Click the Reports icon for a Target Source.

item.title: Target Source Rule Audit H
item.description: Target Source Rule Audit H Target Source Rule Audit V (All Tabs) Use this page to Add Source Audit Rules. To access this page: Access Transform. Click the Targets icon on the Process Area Launch page. Click the Sources icon for a Target. Click the Rules icon for a Target Source. Click the Vertical View icon for a rule. Click the Documentation tab. Click the Audit icon. Field Description STATUS Displays the statusof the Target Source audit report.

item.title: Target Source Rules H
item.description: Target Source Rules H Target Source Rules V (All Tabs) Use the page to Add Target Source Rules. NOTE:Bulk Execution has been enabled on this page. See the Bulk Execution topic in System Administration for more information. To access this page: Access Transform. Click the Targets icon on the Process Area Launch page. Click the Sources icon for a Target. Click the Rules icon for a Target Source. Target Source Rules V All Tabs Target Source Rules H

item.title: Target Sources H
item.description: Target Sources H Target Sources V All Tabs Use this page to Manage Target Sources. NOTE:Bulk Execution has been enabled on this page. Refer to Use Bulk Execution for more information. To access this page: Access Transform. Click the Targets icon on the Process Area Launch page. Click the Sources icon for a Target. Target Sources V All Tabs Target Sources H Use this page to Manage Target Sources.

item.title: Target Types (Setup)
item.description: Target Types (Setup) Use this page to Configure Target Types. To access this page: Access Transform. Select Configuration > Setup > Target Types (Setup) in the Navigation pane. Field Description TARGET TYPE Displays a category for the target. START Displays the start date of the deployment. This field is not verified by Transform and is for informational purposes only.

item.title: Targets H
item.description: Targets H Targets V All Tabs Use this page to: Manage Targets Edit the Priority and Publish Setting Grant a User Access to Sensitive Data on Report Delivery Pages To access this page: Access Transform. Click the Targets icon on the Process Area Launch page. Targets V All Tabs Targets H Use this page to Manage Targets. This page has the following tabs: General tab Process Information tab General tab Field

item.title: Tasks
item.description: Tasks Use this page to Monitor Jobs. To access this page: Access Transform. Click Monitorin the Navigationpane. Click the Tasksicon on the Page toolbar. Field Description STATUS Displays the statusof the task. TITLE Displays the task title. START TIME Displays the date and time the task started processing. END TIME Displays the date and time the task finished processing.

item.title: Trend Summary
item.description: Trend Summary NOTE:For data to display on the Trend Summary reports (Tracking > Summary) and the Summary Type charts (Process Area Launch > Change Summary), the following must happen: Trace must be turned on for the tables, views, functions and procedure counts. Refer to Activate and Deactivate Data Sources for more information. For Transform, trace should be activated for the databases beginning with “dsw”. A milestone must be captured. Refer to Create Milestones for more information.

item.title: Trend Summary (Error Reports)
item.description: Trend Summary (Error Reports) NOTE:For data to display on the Trend Summary reports (Tracking > Summary) and the Summary Type charts (Process Area Launch > Change Summary), the following must happen: Trace must be turned on for the tables, views, functions and procedure counts. Refer to Activate and Deactivate Data Sources for more information. For Transform, trace should be activated for the databases beginning with “dsw”. A milestone must be captured.

item.title: Trend Summary (Procedures)
item.description: Trend Summary (Procedures) NOTE:For data to display on the Trend Summary reports (Tracking > Summary) and the Summary Type charts (Process Area Launch > Change Summary), the following must happen: Trace must be turned on for the tables, views, functions and procedure counts. Refer to Activate and Deactivate Data Sources for more information. For Transform, trace should be activated for the databases beginning with “dsw”. A milestone must be captured.

item.title: Trend Summary (Tables)
item.description: Trend Summary (Tables) NOTE:For data to display on the Trend Summary reports (Tracking > Summary) and the Summary Type charts (Process Area Launch > Change Summary), the following must happen: Trace must be turned on for the tables, views, functions and procedure counts. Refer to Activate and Deactivate Data Sources for more information. For Transform, trace should be activated for the databases beginning with “dsw”. A milestone must be captured.

item.title: Trend Summary (Views)
item.description: Trend Summary (Views) NOTE:For data to display on the Trend Summary reports (Tracking > Summary) and the Summary Type charts (Process Area Launch > Change Summary), the following must happen: Trace must be turned on for the tables, views, functions and procedure counts. Refer to Activate and Deactivate Data Sources for more information. For Transform, trace should be activated for the databases beginning with “dsw”. A milestone must be captured.

item.title: User Filter User Assignment
item.description: User Filter User Assignment Use this page to Add a User to a Report Delivery Filter. To access this page: Access Transform. Select Configuration > User Filter > User Filter (By Filter) in the Navigation pane. Click the Business User Assignment icon for a filter.

item.title: User Filters By User Parent
item.description: User Filters By User Parent Use this page to Create Report Delivery Filters. To access this page: Access Transform. Select Configuration > User Filter > User Filter (By User) in the Navigation pane.

item.title: Workflow Template
item.description: Workflow Template Use this page to Configure Subject and Body of the Report Readiness Notification. To access this page in Transform: Click the Objects icon on the Process Area Launch page. Click the Report Readiness Notification icon for an Object. Click the Workflow Template icon on the Page toolbar. Field Description Reset Workflow Template to Default Click to reset any customizations made to the workflow subject and body back to their shipped defaults.
